TextView.android:text: 1.Acknowledge the presence of excessive use of technology

It is first step toward promotion of healthy use of technology.

I.Keep a log of your online activities for each day.
 
 II keep a log of activities you are missing due to your engagement with online activities and others are raising concerns about your online activities

 III. Identify the situations associated with excessive use of online activities e.g boredom, lonliness etc.IV. Help your to understand /differentiate the work , recreational nonpurposive use of online activities

• Take break if your use exceed more than 30 minutes by stretching blinking your eyes/moving head forward/backward and clockwise and anticlockwise/stretching your arms and legs. 

• Keep reading distance no less than 50 centimeter for a computer,40 centimeter for a tablet/personal computer or 30 centimeter for a smart phone. 
 
 • Ensure adequate sleep for yourself as well as for other.Do delay or reduce sleep for online activities. 

 • Ensure yourself three meals a day with adequate water intake. 

 • Have interactive activities in real life and encourage the same for your children for emotional bonding and social development. 

 • Encourage yourself and children avoid using screen product while doing other task e.g having food ,crossing road, talking to others. 

 • Do not use online activities as a method of coping with negative mood states or to feel good.
If the given suggestions do not work,do not hesitate to seek help or talk to your relatives/counselor.
